message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to invest in this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,000. This is a competitive price, and I believe it's a fair deal considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $10,250. This is a compromise that still benefits both of us.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your original offer, so I'll offer $10,500. This is the highest I'm willing to go.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $10,500. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer the product to you for $10,750. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $10,600, but no higher. This is my final offer.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your limitations, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $10,600. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $10,800. This is the final price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you're willing to make one more compromise, Alice, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go above $10,600. I'm at my budget limit and I really need to stick to it. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet in the middle. Can you reconsider and meet me at $10,700?

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I'm not willing to compromise further on the price. I'm willing to make a final offer of $10,850, which is still below my original asking price. I hope you can reconsider and meet me at this price.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go above $10,600. I've reached my budget limit and I need to stick to it. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet in the middle. I'm sorry, but I think we've reached an impasse.
